sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,ORDER_ID ,SUB_MER_ID ,MER_SYS_ID ,SUB_MER_SIGN_RATE ,SUB_MER_SIGN_HIGH_FEE ,SUB_MER_TRANS_RATE ,SUB_MER_TRANS_HIGH_FEE ,CREATE_DATE ,CREATE_TIME ,PROFIT_DATE ,PROFIT_TIME ,PROFIT ,TRANS_TYPE ,STATUS ,DESC ,RESERVED FROM SUB_MER_SIGN_SETTLE_PROFIT WHERE 1=1 AND SUB_MER_SIGN_SETTLE_PROFIT.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(ORDER_ID) =#order_id#
(SUB_MER_ID) =#sub_mer_id#
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(SUB_MER_SIGN_RATE) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_sign_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_SIGN_HIGH_FEE) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_sign_high_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_TRANS_RATE) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_trans_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_TRANS_HIGH_FEE) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_trans_high_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_DATE) Like '%'||(#create_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PROFIT_DATE) Like '%'||(#profit_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PROFIT_TIME) Like '%'||(#profit_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PROFIT) Like '%'||(#profit:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#trans_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DESC) Like '%'||(#desc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM SUB_MER_SIGN_SETTLE_PROFIT WHERE 1=1 AND SUB_MER_SIGN_SETTLE_PROFIT.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(ORDER_ID) =#order_id#
(SUB_MER_ID) =#sub_mer_id#
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(SUB_MER_SIGN_RATE) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_sign_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_SIGN_HIGH_FEE) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_sign_high_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_TRANS_RATE) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_trans_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_TRANS_HIGH_FEE) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_trans_high_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_DATE) Like '%'||(#create_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PROFIT_DATE) Like '%'||(#profit_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PROFIT_TIME) Like '%'||(#profit_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PROFIT) Like '%'||(#profit:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#trans_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DESC) Like '%'||(#desc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
